description: The file defines a Flutter widget called HomeShell which is a stateful widget managing the main layout of a dashboard-like application. It includes a navigation rail, app bar, drawer, and placeholder content panels, handling navigation between different routes such as dashboard, games, leaderboard, analytics, and settings.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that represents the main shell or layout of the application with navigation controls.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: The state class managing the UI state and interactions for HomeShell.

methods.name: _navItem
methods.description: Creates a NavigationRailDestination widget with specified icon and label.

methods.name: _buildLeftNav
methods.description: Builds the left-side navigation rail with items that navigate to different app routes when selected.

methods.name: _placeholderPanel
methods.description: Creates a placeholder content panel with a title, subtitle, and a grid of dummy cards.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the overall widget tree for the HomeShell, including app bar, drawer, and body layout.
